text: Kasone hastand, ki faristagon conasonro mesitonand, dar hole ki ʙar xestan sitam karda ʙudand. Az onho mepursand: «Dar ci kore ʙuded?» Gujand: «Mo dar rui zamin mardume ʙudem ʙecora». Faristagon gujand: «Ojo zamini Xudo pahnovar naʙud, ki dar on muhocirat kuned?» Makoni inho cahannam ast va sarancomason ʙad
